content: That’s a straight up lie. How is it possible that so many miners are totally clueless when it comes to technicalities of Bitcoin? And more importantly how is possible that such miners block Bitcoin innovations? Nobody can spend SegWit outputs without corresponding private keys unless majority of miners stop supporting SegWit after the activation. The only motivation of miners doing such thing (except a situation where SegWit has some serious vulnerabilities) is to steal funds from SegWit outputs.
